It bundles these libraries and resources:

- H2 database (MPL 2.0 or EPL 1.0, ArmorStand use MPL 2.0 for H2)
- Animation from KaiMyEntity-C (Informal license)

- JavaOSC (BSD-3-Clause)
- mocha (MIT)
- Javassist (MPL 1.1, LGPL 2.1-or-later or Apache 2.0, ArmorStand use LGPL 3.0 for Javassist)

You can see their license in this directory.
